text:
Today we are learning English with the 
incredible Teacher Tiffani from Speak

English with Tiffani. Let’s jump right in!
And every week we help you understand

fast speech in real life without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes, and without subtitles.

In fact, Swarachita says that their English has 
improved in virtually every way by watching our

lessons! Let us help you reach your English 
learning goals, too. But we can only do that

if you hit the subscribe button and bell down 
below, so you don’t miss a single new lesson.

Now we are going to test everything that you have 
learned in today’s video by watching again without

subtitles! But first, here are the answers to the 
Present Perfect quiz from earlier in the video:

So how did you do? Did you get a perfect 
score? Or do you still need some work?
Let us know down in the comments below!

Did you have fun with Teacher Tiffani? 
Definitely check out her channel

and subscribe to learn English with her!
And do not miss our whole interview together,

which you can find anywhere 
you listen to podcasts. But I

recommend you listen on the RealLife 
English App with a full transcript!

And do you want some tips on how 
to speak English more confidently?

Check out my conversation with Emma from 
mmmEnglish now. Let’s watch a clip from that.
